item.title: Marshall Monitor II ANC Troubleshooting
item.description: Chance is you got here because your pair of cool-looking headphones are dead, or the LED is blinking in a way that is not documented.

item.title: How to Install Plausible analytics on Ubuntu 20.10
item.description: As consumers are increasingly aware of the privacy issues on the modern web, that trend has opened up space for some interesting privacy-friendly tools to help you charge your business.

item.title: Can’t connect/SSH to Linux EC2 instance anymore
item.description: Chances are that you’re here because you did something stupid. You locked yourself out of your EC2 instance somehow.
